meeting_info.organization: Oak Cliff Gateway TIF District Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to order and introduction of meeting participants.
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 3 through 6.
Review and consideration of the Meeting Record of the April 24, 2023 Oak Cliff Gateway TIF District Board Meeting.

Review and consideration of a request by Dallas Independent School District (DISD) for the Director of the Office of Economic Development to approve an extension of project completion deadlines up to twelve months for the Hogg Elementary School Improvements Project.
agenda_items.description: Pursuant to Section 2.D of the Development Agreement between the City of Dallas and DISD, as authorized by City Council on April 22, 2020 by Resolution No. 20-0641.

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of the Oak Cliff Gateway TIF District Annual Report for FY 2022-2023.
agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of a regular meeting schedule for the Oak Cliff Gateway TIF District Board of Directors for calendar year 2024.
